sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO tenpay_refund( id , biz_type , appid , cash_fee , mch_id , nonce_str , out_refund_no_0 , out_trade_no , refund_channel_0 , refund_count , refund_fee , refund_fee_0 , refund_id_0 , refund_recv_accout_0 , refund_status_0 , result_code , return_code , return_msg , sign , total_fee , transaction_id , create_time ) VALUES ( #id# , #biz_type# , #appid# , #cash_fee# , #mch_id# , #nonce_str# , #out_refund_no_0# , #out_trade_no# , #refund_channel_0# , #refund_count# , #refund_fee# , #refund_fee_0# , #refund_id_0# , #refund_recv_accout_0# , #refund_status_0# , #result_code# , #return_code# , #return_msg# , #sign# , #total_fee# , #transaction_id# , now() )
